entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Brantford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:39 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brantford Municipal Airport 5:00 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023
Temperature: 2.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 84 %
Dewpoint: 0.0°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of drizzle or rain. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle overnight. Rain beginning before morning. Fog patches developing late this evening and dissipating before morning. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain at times heavy. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023
